title: CNBC Daily Open: Surge in most tech lifts the S&P 500 beyond 6,600 level
description: Alphabet has artificial intelligence to thank for its inclusion in the $3 trillion valuation club. But it's not because Alphabet is excelling in AI.
content:
Congratulations are due to Alphabet for joining the $3 trillion club, to which only Apple , Microsoft and Nvidia have memberships. The Google parent has artificial intelligence —what else? — to thank for its inclusion in that rarefied space.
